event: computed tomography scan showing large air-filled cavity
nonradiopaque choledocholithiasis could not be ruled out
pigtail drain flushed with continuous saline irrigation
antibiotics rationalized to ceftriaxone and metronidazole
continuous pigtail irrigation stopped after 3 days
CT scan showed liquefied collection in segment VII
magnetic resonance imaging performed 6 weeks later
positron emission tomography performed 9 weeks later
PET scan showed no metabolic activity in large collection
